Question: This person's execution of a dance routine was prized for its elegance, grace, originality and precision.
Hints: Instead of using dance as spectacle as Busby Berkeley did, this person used it to move the plot along.
In addition to Phyllis Potter's son, Eliphalet IV (known as Peter), the ____s had two children.
This person also co-introduced a number of song classics via song duets with his partners.
